mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.NAME, p.label, p.CODE, p.url, p.type, p.icon, p.remark, p.path, p.order_num FROM sys_operator AS u LEFT JOIN sys_operator_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.order_num ASC

SELECT id, parent_id, label, code, path, name, url, order_num, type, icon, remark, create_time, update_time, parent_name FROM sys_permission
AND label LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.label},'%')
AND type = #{request.type}
ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission AS p JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN sys_role AS sr ON rp.role_id = sr.id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_role_permission WHERE permission_id = #{id}
